constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 97 (Friday, June 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SABLAN:
H.R. 3730.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H2693]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

sponsors.fullName: Del. Sablan, Gregorio Kilili Camacho [D-MP-At Large]

title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish in the Department of Veterans Affairs an Advisory Committee on United States Outlying Areas and Freely Associated States, and for other purposes.
